c:atomType.name: PanelPosition
c:atomType.c:documentation: The sides of a parent panel to which a child panel may be docked to.

c:atom.name: Left
c:atom.c:documentation: The left side of the child panel is placed at the same position as the left side of the parent panel.

c:atom.name: Right
c:atom.c:documentation: The right side of the child panel is placed at the same position as the right side of the parent panel.

c:atom.name: Top
c:atom.c:documentation: The top side of the child panel is placed at the same position as the top side of the parent panel.

c:atom.name: Bottom
c:atom.c:documentation: The bottom side of the child panel is placed at the same position as the bottom side of the parent panel.
